attributes.action: televise the Dalai Lama's address to MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"The Dalai Lama has appealed to Britain not to forget Tibet in its efforts to forge stronger relations with China", AOL today reports.

We the undersigned, also agree in the rights to autonomy for citizens of every nation state. Further to the petitioner's earlier call for the British govt. to be proactive in finally establishing the globe's territorial boundaries, as a peace - keeping initiative, the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to encourage China to lead the way for other nations to to stop the use of exile as a political tool and reassert the freedoms of individuals.

Please consider his Highness the Dalai Lama for the Nobel Peace Prize in recognition of the important contribution that he personally, as well as other "non-political" world leaders potentially can make to ease religious and nationalistic strife.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
